---
title: "Network analysis report"
output: html_document
---

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(data.table); library(ggplot2)
summary <- fread(' results/networks_summary.csv ')
print(head(summary))
# ejemplo: histograma de n_nodes
p <- ggplot(summary, aes(x = n_nodes)) + geom_histogram(bins=40) + theme_minimal()
print(p)
```
